mapper.select: SELECT * FROM BOARD WHERE 1 = 1 AND TITLE LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchKeyword}, '%') AND CONTENT LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchKeyword}, '%') ORDER BY SEQ DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BOARD(TITLE, WRITER, CONTENT, FILENAME) VALUES(#{title}, #{writer}, #{content}, #{filename})
mapper.update: UPDATE BOARD SET TITLE = #{title}, CONTENT = #{content} WHERE SEQ = #{seq}
